simple.ml
Class StrictParser

java.lang.Object
  simple.ml.StrictParser
Deprecated. 

public class StrictParser
extends java.lang.Object

Deprecated. Use InlineLooseParser or InlineStrictParser instead. Recursive ML parser. No DTD support or validation.
Created: Oct 16, 2010

Author:
Kenneth Pierce

parseSubElements

private static void parseSubElements(Tag tag,
                                     java.lang.CharSequence src,
                                     DoubleParsePosition limits)
                              throws java.text.ParseException
Deprecated. 
Creates and adds elements to the tag. Should call itself recursively for each non-self-closing element. Text between elements is added as CDATA on a per encounter basis. Meaning there may be more than one CDATA element.

Parameters:
tag - Tag object that represents the surrounding tag.
src - The page's source.
limits - Object that marks the beginning and ending index for this tag's content
Throws:
java.text.ParseException
